name: ChristmasRadio
0:
”Alexa, open christmas radio”
”Alexa, ask christmas radio what's on”
”Alexa, ask christmas radio what was running before”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas radio
des:
Christmas Radio gets you in the festive mood! With the best Christmas hits - from popular classics to modern songs. Whether you're decorating the tree, baking cookies or simply relaxing - we're always there for you! 

To play, simply say “Alexa, play Christmas Radio” or “Alexa, start Christmas Radio”.
You can stop playback at any time by saying “Alexa, stop”.

Would you like more information? We offer you the following options:

Alexa, ask Christmas Radio what's on.
Alexa, ask Christmas Radio what was on last.

The radio stream is provided by laut.fm, the User Generated Radio™.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
